title: Parma (Duquesa de)
body: The infanta D. Maria Ant√≥nia, daughter of D. Miguel I and widow of Prince Roberto de Bourbon, Duke of Parma, visited Madeira from April 7 to May 22, 1922, to visit her daughter, the former empress Zita. Her children, the princes Xisto, Xavier, and Renato, and the princess Isabel accompanied her, with the first three leaving for Lisbon on April 12, 1922.
